Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Increases the age of eligibility for provisional or permanent appointment of certain police officers from thirty-five to forty
Summary: Increases the age of eligibility for provisional or permanent appointment of certain police officers from thirty-five to forty.
LawCode: Amd ยง58, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to increasing the age of eligibility for provisional or permanent appointment of certain police officers from thirty-five to forty
